@bad_bad_day

There are no Trojan in this game/installer..
Just false alert of your Hentai Virus..
Tested and the FIX are really working..
Thanks a lot..

Spent some time trying to get it to work too...was kinda pissed....but listen.... to make game full edit tinyiso.ini change the app id to 207020
And it works :)

what the fuck is this shit, i cant even run the game becuz there is no launcher or game application its just a .bin and a .cue file and the there is tinyiso system config and another config settings what the hell do i do?

i cant save the tinyiso file,it doesn't let
what to do?

When I started the game it was in demo mode and I could only play the "free mode". Career mode was locked. But I followed CrazyCroats instructions and it worked, now the game is full mode.
right click on the tinyiso.ini file and click edit, then change the app id to 207020, exit and save, play the game.

So honest guys! Do'es this work on PC or what ? It doesn't seem Noobfreindly. 

If somebody know where to find this for PSP or Xbox360 ( TPB version is J-tagged ) please link me to it.
